name: Alien Battles (Roopkotha Studio)
description:
As a pilot, your goal is to protect the Earth from alien invaders! Your goal will be challenging however, as the aliens will become more tougher over time and asteroids are also heading for Earth. As you progress, you will be able to buy new upgrades and perks for your spaceship.

Features:

  • 10 levels
  • Several boss battles
  • Powerups
  • Upgrade your lasers ans speed
  • Perks which have their own pros and cons

The fate of Earth lies in your hands! Will you successfully defend the Earth from alien invaders and asteroids?
